Trigger

ClearingTrigger
Monitoring
A Trigger that starts its life with type = CLEARING. The type of the trigger can be changed dynamically.
See also
Github - ClearingTrigger Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.monitoring.Clearing
Syntax
Copy
<ClearingTrigger />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
recordKey	text	-
Key under which this flow is registered in the manager
nextRecordHandlerManagerRef	text	-
Name of the manager to be used after handling this record
recordHandlerRef	text	-
Name of the recordHandler to be used to transform records of the type specified in the key (optional)
recordHandlerManagerRef	text	-
Name of the manager to which this flow must be added
resultHandlerRef	text	-
Name of the resultHandler to be used to handle the transformed result
openBlockBeforeLine	text	-
